jmortgage.amortization
Interface FixedAmortizationBuilder.Payment

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultFixedAmortizationBuilder.DefaultPayment
Enclosing interface:
FixedAmortizationBuilder
public static interface FixedAmortizationBuilder.Payment

A payment object. Instantiations of this interface calculate the total amount of the payment, the principal paid, the interest paid, the balance due after the payment, and the cumulative interest paid after the payment.

Method Summary
 double getBalance()
          Gets the balance due after this payment.
 double getBalanceUnrounded()
          Gets the balance due after this payment unrounded.
